attributes.additional_details:
We are getting to the stage of closing hospitals merging trusts reducing services 
being offered to the people of the United Kingdom.  
Why it is other European countries are not having the same problems? 50,000 operations cancelled hospitals in massive debt being forced to merge Then outsource services. Staff leaving hospitals at an all-time high. 
 Please remove Mr Hunt from office and get someone who has a clue before it is too late.
attributes.background:
The NHS has been underfunded throughout the conservative time in office.
This clearly lies with the man at the top not fighting its corner ‘Jeremy Hunt’  who needs to go.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
